title: Virtual World-Based Social Problem-Solving Competency Development Course

context.prior_knowledge: Familiarity with fundamental social science theories and professional field experience
context.additional_context: Collaborative problem-solving learning through simulation in multi-user virtual environments to address social issues.

learning_goals: Learners can design and execute professional collaboration scenarios in virtual world environments
Learners can propose solutions to social issues through project deliverables based on virtual world platforms
Learners can creatively resolve unpredictable situations in multi-user virtual environments with over 80% success
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
